titleStmt.title: The churches hazard deliuered in a sermon in the cathedrall church in Norvvich, vpon the fifth of Nouember. 1629. By Tho. Reeve, Minister of Gods Word at Coleby in Norfolke.
titleStmt.author: Reeve, Tho. (Thomas), 1583 or 4-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Augustine Mathevves, for Iohn Grismond, and are to be solde at his shop in Iuy-lane at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Three sermons; pagination is continuous. Each sermon has separate dated title page. Sermon 2 title page reads: Nabals arraignement: or a Christmasse churle. Sermon 3 title page reads: Moses old square for iudges.
Sermon 2 identified as STC 20834 and sermon 3 identified as STC 20833 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Iuy-lane at the signe of the Gunne
